metadata.title: CVE-2019-15739 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition 8.1through 12.2.1. Certain areas displaying Markdown were not properlysanitizing some XSS payloads.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
